ItemTooltips.gauntlets: Gives early HP. Build it into a bracer later.
ItemTooltips.ghost: Buy this if you are being killed by physical damage.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good HP regen for when you are low.
ItemTooltips.tango: Regens you a little bit to help counteract harass.
ItemTooltips.courier: Every team needs a courier, if someone else buys one get wards instead.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Very good item that heals everyone when used.
ItemTooltips.flying_courier: Upgrade the courier once you have some extra gold.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Buy this if no one else does.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Very good disable but expensive, do not worry if you can not afford it.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: A good alternative to Scythe of Vyse since it is cheaper.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Allows you to escape and do other useful things with the active. Passive gives you good bonuses.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: Give you HP and Mana pool and summons strong units. Get it to push and against invisible enemies.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Good aura for the team and good stats for you.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: Very good slow and gives you good HP.

AbilityTooltips.disruptor_thunder_strike: Good nuke at level 1 but not worth maxing.
AbilityTooltips.disruptor_glimpse: Allows you to keep enemies form running. Also useful for enemies who have just TPed into a fight.
AbilityTooltips.disruptor_kinetic_field: Use this to trap enemies. Later on you can use it to keep people in your Static Storm.
AbilityTooltips.disruptor_static_storm: Use this in team fights on as many enemies as possible.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Take these when there is no other choice.
